explains: adj. 充满蒸汽的，热而潮湿的；色情的

sentences.en: He'd had a steamy affair with an office colleague.
sentences.cn: 他和办公室的一位同事曾经闹过桃色新闻。

sentences.en: Avoid hot tubs and steamy baths.
sentences.cn: 避免热水浸浴和蒸汽浴。

sentences.en: They are waiting for their lunch in some steamy haus.
sentences.cn: 他们在一间潮湿闷热的房间里等着吃午饭。
